messages.title: A Cambridge Experience
messages.content: The Cambridge Experience wishes all our readers a wonderful Christmas and New Years!

messages.title: Cambridge Experience
messages.content: Exclusive Interview: We speak to Cambridge MP Julian Huppert.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Taking mental health as seriously as physical health, helping to end the stigma around mental health and plans for new waiting times.
Discussion of residents coping with the cost of living.
Advocating for fairer school funding, highlighting issues related to school funding cuts.
Support for free school meals, emphasizing that the whole class benefits when every child is well-fed.

issues.economy: Discussion about residents coping with the cost of living. Mention of savings on income tax and tax-free childcare.
issues.education: Highlight of the school funding petition and issues related to cuts in school funding.
issues.health: Focus on mental health, including efforts to end stigma and introduce new waiting times for treatment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud of putting Cambridge residents first.

politicalExperience.achievements: Described as a true parliamentarian, believed to put Cambridge residents first.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a festive section with recommendations for a perfect Cambridge Christmas.
